xml.data:
Home » 12S2 Nidānavaggasaṃyuttapāḷi » 6 Lābhasakkārasaṃyutta » 6.3 Tatiyavagga
6.3.7 Tatiyasamaṇabrāhmaṇasutta
Lābhasakkārasaṃyutta
Tatiyavagga
Tatiyasamaṇabrāhmaṇasutta
176.
1072Sāvatthiyaṃ viharati. “Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā lābhasakkārasilokaṃ yathābhūtaṃ nappajānanti, lābhasakkārasilokasamudayaṃ nappajānanti, lābhasakkārasilokanirodhaṃ nappajānanti, lābhasakkārasilokanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ nappajānanti …pe…  pajānanti…pe…  sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharantī”ti.
1073Sattamaṃ.
<< 6.3.6 Dutiyasamaṇabrāhmaṇasuttaup6.3.8 Chavisutta >>
